page.title: 13 Questionare
page.content: Some of the questions asked about attitudes to facilities in Margate, requesting opinions on a five point scale; Very Good, Good, Don't Know, Poor, Very Poor. The most popular seem to be sports facilities. 68% replied "Yes" to the question, "Do you go to the beach often in the summer ?". The parks were the second most popular facility, with 66% thinking them Very Good or Good. The cinemas attracted 50% positive response, but theatres and concerts were less popular. 33% answered, "Don't Know" concerning theatres and 37% gave the same answer about concerts. The least popular facilities are the shopping centres. 30% of people said they travel to Westwood Hypermarket.
